content:
who would know the most about messing with the resolver? i'm curious about planning out intra-doc links work and this is the biggest hurdle rn https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/43466

right now we can only properly resolve links if the docs are actually written in the current crate, and re-exporting something from a different crate creates a weird gray-zone where it tries to resolve everything in the re-export location instead of the original
(i hope i'm using zulip correctly, i haven't tried it before >_>)
most likely candidates are @Vadim Petrochenkov or @eddyb
